name: Poop It All
description:
3D shooter video game where you take control of a pigeon flying throughout a white city. Paint everything you can with your multicoloured droppings!

You have 3 minutes and 3 lives to paint as much as you can!

Will you paint all the buildings and historic characters' statues without getting caught by the enemies?

Controls
Movement: WASD
Turbo: LSHIFT
Barrel Roll: E
Shoot: Spacebar
Look backwards: C
Aim backwards: WASD (while looking backwards)
Shoot backwards: Left Click
